4.post_text:
Calling all humans and fuzzy creatures alike! Enjoy 1-for-1 on Venti-sized Orange Honeycomb Crunch or Triple Coffee Frappuccino when you pay with your Starbucks Mobile App. Limited to 2 orders per customer. Valid from 13th June, while stocks last. 

Available on iOS and Android: http://bit.ly/starbucksmobileapp

Hi, my friend Cheng Hua and I bought the Orange Honeycomb & Triple Coffee Frap earlier in the evening. Both of us ended up with terrible stomachache and had the runs just an hour after the drink. My friend is still having diarrhea now, in fact he has gone 3 times already! I'm shocked as this is the 1st time such an incident is happening after my years of supporting Starbucks. 

We bot the drinks at Vivo around 6.30pm. There wasn't a long queue but yet the staff got my order wrong. I was asked at least twice if I wanted whipped cream to which I said no. In the end both drinks still came with the cream.

Starbucks' standard is certainly more than this....

20.post_text: An opportunity to be more than just an employee. Be a partner today.

comments.message:
I just tried the Choco frape :)

Really taste like Black Forest, not too sweet and just nice for my taste. :)

Went to City Square Mall (one of Starbucks newest outlet) few minutes ago and purchase it.

The cashier named Jonny whom serve me was calm, took a look at my phone and able to produce it less then 1 min.

Took a grande size and just pay $7.60 as there free customization as stated in the website itself.

Am just a Starbucks newbie, enjoyed his service plus present too as well.

The barista whom made the drink, one look at the description on the cup and able to do it swiftly with ease.

Think it's also time for starbucks sg to up the training/briefing of their staff...was initially thrilled and excited to try out the frappe recipes, but my visit to 313 Somerset outlet this afternoon ended up in disappointment coz [1] when I tried to claim customisation coupon to try 1 of the recipes, cashier staff simply brushed it off as a scam that they've been seeing these few days [2] staff only went on to check abt this promo only at my insistence [3] returned with another staff to say that I've got to complete tasks on website to claim promo [4] when I highlighted to staff that the website states clearly that all I need to do is flash coupon, reply from staff was "oh, yes ok, anyway it's just 1 free customisation. We can do it for you". And so I ended up leaving the store without trying any. Bad experience considering I'm a fan of Starbucks for its creative seasonal and limited edition drinks.

Hi Starbucks, looks like we weren't the only ones who could not enjoy the one-for-one promotion stated in the email you sent out. I was told by counter staff that this was only applicable to "special" My Starbucks Reward cardholders and receiving the email doesn't mean you'll automatically get to enjoy the one-for-one promotion. My dad and I paid for the drinks anyway but the barista on duty was very rude and dismissive when we asked about the promotion after ordering. She repeatedly insisted this was a promotion available only in America and only relented when I took out my phone to show her the emailer. This was at the Starbucks at Wilkie Edge. I suppose your staff was rude because they're not sure how to deal with customers who were expecting to enjoy the one-for-one promotion. Regardless, still leaves a very bad tasste. In sum, misleading advertising = extremely, incredibly poor form. Attached is the email in question. Mark Wong

I am currently at the Woodlands mrt Starbucks,  however I was told that I cannot use this "free customisation" promotion as it wasnt reflected in my card. I explained that it said in the terms and condition that we only have to flash this digital coupon but the staff insisted no, so that was nth much I could do. 

I thought it is open to everyone from 5th to 8th may? Is there even any promotion? Or is it a gimmick to get us to order a drink anyway. I honestly feel kind of cheated. 

As a long term loyal Starbucks member, I do feel disappointed. Please advise.
Have anyone claim this? Went to Starbuck airport they said the promo is not valid everywhere

just went to Starbucks Tampines Mall to order and i flash the coupon but the staff told me don't have this promotion. Instead the staff told me I must download the app to have the coupon or I must have the coupon in my starbucks card in order to enjoy the customisation. But on your website and the terms and condition wrote I just have to flash the coupon and i can enjoy it... There must be a lot of miscommunication between the outlets and the HQ... so many people complaining about this promotion here
Tried one of the recipes but they dun hv the irish cream in stores!
